item.title: Full Stack Developer — BigBasket
item.description:
• Worked as a part of product and features development team.
  • Designed and developed a priority order flow for members. This feature allows exclusive access to promotions, evouchers, and priority slots.
  • Used AWS Lambda for digitally signing PDF Invoices for customers. (For GST)
  • Integrated with third party eSodexo to allow an easy payment flow for members.
  • Automated testing using python selenium.
  • Worked on stored procedures to provide optimal execution for routine scripts that were less performant.
  • Integrated third-party API for the entire last-mile delivery for BigBasket. The solution gives an integration to cater to the last mile routing, tracking of delivery vehicles, and reporting.
  • Integrated with third-party logistics (delivery services) Bike Ninja and Shadowfax, with BB backend for delivering small orders and express orders.
  • Implemented a feature for stocking products in a warehouse in the most optimal way, this solution increases the picking efficiency, reduces replenishment requirements and maximizes throughput by determining the best slot locations for all products in the DC.
  • Designed and developed a portal for order allocation using Backbone.js for frontend and python for the backend.
  • Developed the banner engine for the website. Provided a feature to link banners to other entities in the database, displaying banners based on the entity’s availability.
  • Designed and developed core logic for handling delivery charges for different types of orders.
  • Worked on an algorithm to display products specific to the customer’s locality based on the product’s availability.
